spec.name: Hourly_Avg
spec.query:
timeRange = 1h

from(bucket: "bucket")
    |> range(start: -timeRange)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "readings")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field != "Sensor_Heartbeat")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field != "Bridge_UUID")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field != "Channel")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field != "Pipe")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field != "BLE_UUID")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field != "Sensor_ID")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field != "Module_Name")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field != "BLE_FW_Version")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field != "RSSI")
    |> aggregateWindow(every: timeRange, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
    |> to(bucket: "Hourly_Bucket", org: "texol")
